name: JDE Drifter
description:
Play as the JDE Drifter: a quick and nimble ship that can dash through enemies at incredible speed.  Try to survive against multiple alien ships trying to swarm you and shoot you down.

via GIPHY

Left click to dash forward and through enemies and destroy them.  Each enemy type will attack in a unique way.  Avoid their bullets to stay alive, you can only get hit so many times before it's game over.

via GIPHY

This was made for the Very First Extra Credits Game Design Jam!

Post your high-scores in the comments section!

THE TEAM

  • Luke Mayo (Programmer)
  • Grayson Ducker (Artist)
  • Justin Sales (Programmer)
  • Eric Moen (Audio)
